nodes.text: Ludwig Göransson (born September 1, 1984) is an Academy Award and Grammy Award–winning Swedish film composer and record producer. He is best known for writing and producing alongside Childish Gambino and for composing the musical scores of Fruitvale Station, Creed, and Black Panther, which received an Academy Award for Best Original Score. He composed the musical score of the Disney+ Star Wars series The Mandalorian.
